OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord Karnofsky performance status ( 90-100 % vs 60-80 % ) , weight loss ( 5 % vs 6-10 % ) , baseline hemoglobin ( woman 11.0-12.4 g/dL men 11.0-13.4 g/dL vs woman 12.5-15.0 g/dL men 13.5-15.0 g/dL ) . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Beginning 7-10 day start chemoradiotherapy , patient receive epoetin alfa subcutaneously weekly 8 week . Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour carboplatin IV 30 minute weekly 7 week . Patients undergo radiotherapy 5 day week 7 week total 33 treatment . Treatment continue absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - Arm II : Patients receive paclitaxel , carboplatin , radiotherapy arm I . Quality life assess baseline , completion chemoradiotherapy , every 3 month 1 year , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 3 year . Patients follow every 3 month 1 year , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month 3 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 202-232 patient ( 101-116 per treatment arm ) accrue study within 1.7-2 year .
